field.name: productname1
field.label: Product name 1st part
field.description: First part of product name in the URL.

field.name: productname2
field.label: Product name 2nd part
field.description: Second part of product name in the URL.

field.name: productname3
field.label: Product name 3rd part
field.description: Third part of product name in the URL.

field.name: numberproducts
field.label: Number duplicate product names
field.description: If set to Yes, URLs to products with the same name will be numbered.

field.name: childtoparent
field.label: Always link to parent
field.description: If enabled, URLs to child products will be replaced with links to their parent. This option may help reduce the duplicate content problems.

field.name: manufacturer
field.label: Add manufacturer to product URL
field.description: If set to Yes, manufacturer name will be added to URL before product name.

field.name: manufacturerid
field.label: Add manufacturer ID to product URL
field.description: If set to Yes, manufacturer ID will be prepended to manufacturer name in product URL.

field.name: store_manufacturerid
field.label: Store manufacturer_id in URLs to products
field.description: If set to Yes, the manufacturer_id variable will always be stored in database for product URLs, otherwise it will always be removed.

field.name: manufacturer_category
field.label: Add manufacturer to category URL
field.description: If set to Yes, manufacturer name will be added to category URL if manufacaturer filter is used. Note: If you select No, virtuemart_manufacturer_id will be added to query string anyway.

field.name: manufacturerid_category
field.label: Add manufacturer ID to category URL
field.description: If set to Yes, manufacturer ID will be prepended to manufacturer name in category URL.

field.name: catname1
field.label: Category name 1st part
field.description: First part of category name in the URL.

field.name: catname2
field.label: Category name 2nd part
field.description: Second part of category name in the URL.

field.name: catname3
field.label: Category name 3rd part
field.description: Third part of category name in the URL.

field.name: categories
field.label: Add categories to URL
field.description: Controls the way categories are added to URL.

field.name: productcategories
field.label: Add categories to product URLs
field.description: If set to Yes, categories will be prepended to product name. If set to No, only product name will be used.

field.name: fileid
field.label: Add file ID to URL
field.description: If set to Yes, file ID will be prepended to downloadable file title in URL.

field.name: flypagehandle
field.label: Flypage handling
field.description: Select how you want the flypage to be handled.
field.option: Only not default add to SEF URL

field.name: defaultflypage
field.label: Default flypage
field.description: Select which flypage is default

field.name: ignorecats
field.label: Ignore multiple categories
field.description: If set to Yes, only the first category will be used in URLs - use if you have products in multiple categories, but you chose not to add categories to URL.

field.name: sefcart
field.label: SEF Cart URLs
field.description: Select which URLs to cart you want to SEF - all of them, direct link only (adding products will not be SEFed), or none of them.

field.name: sefcheckout
field.label: SEF Checkout URLs
field.description: Select if you want to SEF the URLs through the checkout process.

field.name: vendorid
field.label: Add vendor ID to URL
field.description: If set to Yes, vendor ID will be prepended to vendor name in URL.

field.name: pagehandle
field.label: Pagination handling
field.description: Choose how you want the pagination links to be handled.

field.name: pagelimit
field.label: Default list limit
field.description: Set the default list limit for your categories, 0 means that the list limit from VM will be used.

field.name: addlimitstart
field.label: Always add limitstart
field.description: If set to Yes, the limitstart variable will always be used for categories. This may fix some duplicates.

field.name: improvecaching
field.label: Improve Pagination Caching
field.description: Improves compatibility with caching mechanisms for product categories pagination (eg. for JotCache component).

field.name: producttype
field.label: Add product type to URL
field.description: If set to Yes, product type will be added to URL when browsing products using their type.

field.name: producttypeid
field.label: Add product type ID to URL
field.description: If set to Yes, product type ID will be prepended to product type in URL.

field.name: producttypeparameter
field.label: Add product type parameter name to URL
field.description: If set to Yes, product type parameter name will be added to URL when browsing products using their type.

field.name: product_title
field.label: Product page title
field.description: Select how the page title for product page should be created.

field.name: category_title
field.label: Category page title
field.description: Select how the page title for category page should be created.

field.name: title_sep
field.label: Separator
field.description: The separator used in page title.

field.name: meta_desc
field.label: Generate description
field.description: Automatically generates meta description

field.name: desc_len
field.label: Description length
field.description: Meta description maximum length.

field.name: product_desc
field.label: Product description
field.description: Select how the meta description for product page should be created.

field.name: product_desc_cat
field.label: Add category to product description
field.description: Select if the category title should be added to product description.

field.name: category_desc
field.label: Category description
field.description: Select how the meta description for category page should be created.

field.name: meta_keys
field.label: Generate keywords
field.description: Automatically generates meta keywords (works only when Product and Category descriptions are not set to Default)

field.name: cat_keys_src
field.label: Category keywords source
field.description: Select the source for keywords generation on category pages

field.name: prod_keys_src
field.label: Product keywords source
field.description: Select the source for keywords generation on product details pages

field.name: keys_minlen
field.label: Minimum keyword length
field.description: Minimum length a word must have to be listed as a keyword.

field.name: keys_count
field.label: Number of keywords
field.description: Number of meta keywords.
